QuestData.Title: Moonclaw's Wisdom
QuestData.Description: Our quick action today has stopped this aggression and saved my valley. As you requested, I will join Malfurion in the Grove of Cenarius.$B$BStill, there is much about these satyrs that I wish to tell you. This information would be most valuable to you.$B$BPlease meet me in my den before departing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Thaon Moonclaw in his den.
